thread.title: Evidence-Based Medicine

title: Evidence-Based Medicine
text:
Email alerts 
Evidence-Based Medicine systematically searches a wide range of international medical journals applying strict criteria for the validity of research. Content is critically appraised then the most clinically relevant articles are summarised into a succinct expert commentary focusing on the papers key findings and implications for clinical practice. Evidence-Based Medicine also publishes articles relevant to the study and practice of evidence-based medicine; including Original Research and Reviews. 
This home page is under development Latest Content 
EBM primer: Rating the certainty in evidence in the absence of a single estimate of effect (20 March, 2017) 
Perspective:
